name: Ed's Venture
description:
In our youthful eagerness, we started working on this project for our school's assignment. It is our very first attempt at creating a game, and as one would expect, it is far from perfect. There are bugs, it is very much not finished, and we had to compromise on many of the features. Nevertheless, it will never be forgotten, no matter what kind of future lies ahead. 

Upon loading up the game, we recommend you choose 'Aj' unless you are proficient in Czech. Grammar Nazis be warned.

Controls:

WASD/arrow keys to move 

J to attack

E to interact

Arrow keys to navigate the menu

Enter to confirm selection in the menu

There is an option to save the game but we forgot how. It's probably one of the F keys or something... as in F1, F2, etc.

Thou shan't underestimate the Mighty Pear.
